Class Weapon

java.lang.Object
com.arena.dual_arena.models.weapons.Weapon
Direct Known Subclasses:
Gun, Rifle, RocketLauncher, Sniper
public abstract class Weapon extends Object
Abstract class that defines the common properties and functionalities of weapons in the game. This class serves as a base for specific weapon types, providing standard attributes such as fire rates, projectile types, and performance multipliers.

  • Constructor Details

    • Weapon

      protected Weapon(float primaryFireRate, float secondaryFireRate, String primaryProjectileType, String secondaryProjectileType, float rangeMultiplier, float speedMultiplier, float knockbackMultiplier)
      Constructs a Weapon object with specified attributes defining the weapon's behavior and properties.
      Parameters:
      primaryFireRate - The rate at which the primary mode fires projectiles (shots per second).
      secondaryFireRate - The rate at which the secondary mode fires projectiles (shots per second).
      primaryProjectileType - The type of projectile used in the primary firing mode.
      secondaryProjectileType - The type of projectile used in the secondary firing mode.
      rangeMultiplier - Multiplier affecting the range of the weapon's projectiles.
      speedMultiplier - Multiplier affecting the speed of the weapon's projectiles.
      knockbackMultiplier - Multiplier affecting the knockback effect of the weapon's projectiles on hit.
